casebody.data:
Joseph Levinson and Harry Levinson, trading as Levinson’s Loan Bank, plaintiffs in error, v. The Fidelity & Casualty Company of New York, defendant in error.Gen. No. 34,337.

Wilson, P. J., dissents.

Opinion filed June 15, 1931.Cassels, Potter & Bentley and Tannenbaum, Polikoff & Schmidt, for plaintiffs in error; Ralph F. Potter, George C. Bunge and Raymond W. Hamill, of counsel.Winston, Strawn & Shaw and Hans L. Howard, for defendant in error; Edward W. Everett and Geo. T. Evans, of counsel. Mr. Justice Friend

delivered the opinion of the court.
